summary: This document contains a subpoena issued to AT&T for subscriber information and records related to an ongoing investigation. It includes instructions for compliance and emphasizes the confidentiality of the request. The document also outlines the legal obligations of AT&T in relation to the subpoena. This document appears to contain call detail records and financial information related to various individuals, possibly in connection with the Epstein case. It includes timestamps and call durations, but lacks clear narrative context or named individuals due to the garbled text. This document contains billing records from AT&T, including call details and data transfer logs associated with various accounts. It includes an affidavit from Carol Gilligan, a Legal Compliance Analyst at AT&T, verifying the authenticity of the records. The document is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Gavin Gumbiner
persons.context: Gavin Gumbiner is mentioned as the FBI Special Agent responsible for receiving the requested records from AT&T as part of the investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey H. Sloman
persons.context: Jeffrey H. Sloman is referenced as the Acting United States Attorney who issued the subpoena and requested early voluntary turnover of the materials.

persons.name: Patricia Dunn
persons.context: Patricia Dunn is identified as the financially liable party for the AT&T account in question, with various details about her account provided.

persons.name: Carol Gilligan
persons.context: Carol Gilligan is the custodian of records for AT&T and verifies the authenticity of the attached billing records.

connections.description: Gavin Gumbiner works under the supervision of Jeffrey H. Sloman as part of the FBI's investigation team.
Gavin Gumbiner is investigating Patricia Dunn's account as part of the subpoena issued to AT&T.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: AT&T is commanded to appear and provide records before the Grand Jury in West Palm Beach, Florida.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: A subpoena was issued to AT&T for subscriber information related to the investigation.

locations: 701 Clematis Street, West Palm Beach, Florida 33401
505 South Flagler Drive, Suite 500, West Palm Beach, Florida 33401
keyFacts: The document is a subpoena for AT&T to provide subscriber information and records.
Patricia Dunn is identified as the financially liable party for the AT&T account.
Gavin Gumbiner is the FBI Special Agent responsible for the subpoena.
The subpoena requires compliance by November 12, 2009.
The document emphasizes confidentiality and non-disclosure regarding the investigation.
The document contains numerous call detail records with timestamps and durations.
There are references to financial transactions, but specific details are obscured.
The text is heavily garbled, making it difficult to extract coherent information.
The document includes billing records for various accounts maintained by AT&T.
Carol Gilligan has been employed by AT&T since October 31, 2004.
The records include subscriber information and call detail for specific cellular numbers.
The document is subject to a protective order, limiting its distribution.
The affidavit was sworn on March 17, 2010.
